name: Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander
tag_list: corporate-banking-services, investment-banking-services, including-treasury-solutions, asset-finance, wealth-management-services, high-net-worth-individuals
overview: Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander Limited offers integrated financial services to companies, institutional investors, and individuals. It provides corporate banking services to small and medium sized companies, as well as a range of investment banking services, including treasury solutions, asset finance, and wealth management services to high net worth individuals. The company provides investment banking services, including merger and acquisition advisory, acquisition and leveraged finance, debt syndication and distribution, equity capital markets, and principal investments; capital markets services; and wealth structuring services, including taxation of investments, pensions, inheritance tax planning, offshore issues, and philanthropy. Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander Limited also provides investment management advisory services, such as discretionary investment management, multi asset portfolios, tax efficient investments, pension fund management, fund information, and fund prices; treasury services, such as interest rate, foreign exchange, and liquidity management solutions; private banking; and international banking. In addition, it offers property finance services, such as residential development, commercial development, overseas property, property partnerships, and investment funding; asset finance services, such as taxi finance, block discounting, insurance premium finance, healthcare leasing, bus and coach finance, Hermes group, and commercial asset finance; and credit services, such as super yachts, private aircraft, and fine art finance, as well as other financial instruments, including portfolios of quoted and unquoted shares. Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander Limited was formerly known as Singer & Friedlander Finance, Ltd. The company was founded in 1907 and is based in London, the United Kingdom. Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander Limited operates as a subsidiary of Kaupthing Singer & Friedlander Group PLC.
